body: A synopsis for those that want to know what's happening: guy makes a wish to have sex with women. He gets his wish, but the way the wish is granted makes things weird. He gets to have sex with women, but the ones drawn to him have some sort of conflict/issue. After having sex with the protag, the women get the resolve to deal/fix the problem in their lives. Incidentally, none of them want to get into a relationship with him. So he's stuck in this situation where he's having sex like he wished, but all are one-night stands.
